skills.title: Real-Time Space Availability Updates
skills.description: Receive instant updates on available parking spaces across the university campus, ensuring efficient utilization of parking facilities. Never waste time searching for parking again.

skills.title: Customized Parking Permit Management
skills.description: Tailor parking permits to specific user needs, whether it's for students, faculty, or visitors. Easily manage permit issuance, renewal, and enforcement through our intuitive system.

skills.title: Intelligent Parking Analytics
skills.description: Harness the power of data analytics to optimize parking operations. Gain insights into peak usage hours, parking trends, and vehicle distribution to enhance resource allocation and planning.

skills.title: Environmentally Friendly Parking Solutions
skills.description: Embrace sustainability with eco-conscious parking management solutions. Implement strategies such as electric vehicle charging stations, carpooling incentives, and green parking initiatives to reduce carbon emissions and promote environmentally friendly transportation options across the university campus.
